name: Depthris
description:
Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS.

Move and rotate the pieces along the 3 axes (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

Features


4 game modes:

  • Classic: Play the game with the classic puzzle pieces of the 2D puzzle game Tetris.
  • Relaxing: Same as Classic mode but you will not level up, the fall speed will not change.
  • Challenging: Classic with some new pieces that can trick your brain.
  • Insane: Challenging mode plus new pieces that increase the difficulty to a new level.

Different Volumes

From the smallest 4x4x10 to the biggest 8x8x20, you can customize your level of challenge. each has it's own local leaderboard.

Gamepad Support

Supports PS4/PS5 and Xbox controllers. with more to come.

Widescreen Support

16:9 and 32:9 Aspect ratios supported
